bill.title: Emergency medical personnel; revise requirements for training and certification programs for.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 41-59-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The State Board Of Health Shall Provide For The Regulation And Licensing Of Public And Private Training And Certification Of Emergency Medical Services Personnel, Including Emergency Medical Technicians-intermediate And Emergency Medical Technicians-paramedic; To Amend Section 41-60-13, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Board Must Approve Any Accredited Training Program For Advanced Life Support Trainees And Personnel That Conforms To The Requirements Of This Section, Without Regard For Whether The Training Program Is Offered Through A Public Institution; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Human Services
